comment: /**  * Marks the source a stopped and calls {@link StoppableFunction#stop()} on the user function.  */
code: /**  * Marks the source a stopped and calls {@link StoppableFunction#stop()} on the user function.  */ public void stop() {     // important: marking the source as stopped has to happen before the function is stopped.     // the flag that tracks this status is volatile, so the memory model also guarantees     // the happens-before relationship     markCanceledOrStopped().     userFunction.stop(). }
